ftbquests.chapter.elemental_craft.title: Elemental Craft[--元素合成--]
ftbquests.chapter.elemental_craft.quests: Inert Elemental Source[--惰性元素源--]
The path of the elements[--元素之路--]
These &bInert Crystals&r are normally found in ores buried deep below the surface, but there isn't exactly a surface here them to be buried under.[--这些&b惰性水晶&r通常在深埋在地表下的矿石中找到,但在这里没有可以埋在它们的地表.--]
Instead, get them by transmuting &6Source Gem Blocks&r with a Pure Daisy.[--反之,通过&6魔源宝石块&r与纯雏菊转化来获得它们.--]
Not-so-inert Crystals[--不至于灰烬水晶--]
By making the &bContained Crystal&r, you can enhance its conductivity and make it more receptive to elemental energies.[--通过制作&b致密水晶&r,你可以增强它的传导性,使其更容易接受元素能量.--]
Element Evaporator[--元素蒸馏器--]
Make an Element Evaporator[--制作元素蒸馏器--]
Elemental energy needs to be captured to be used.[--需要捕获元素能量才能使用.--]
Place an &bElement Evaporator&r directly on an &bElement Container&r and then insert Elemental Shards.[--将&b元素蒸馏器&r直接放在&b元素容器&r上然后插入元素碎片.--]
The Evaporator will begin collecting and storing the energy in the Container. [--蒸馏器将开始在容器中收集并存储能量。--]
Drenched Metal, not Rust![--干燥金属,不是生锈!--]
Infusing Iron with elemental water will produce &bDrenched Iron&r, which is more malleable and receptive to elemental tinkering.[--用元素水灌注铁将产生&b破碎铁&r,这更可塑性,更能接受元素工匠.--]
Make an Element Container[--制作一个元素容器--]
The full-sized &bElement Container&r can store &6100,000&r of an element, compared to the Small Container's 1000.[--&b元素容器&r可以存储&6100,000&r的元素,而小型容器是1000.--]
Otherwise, it works the same.[--否则,它的工作原理相同。--]
Make an Element Binder[--做个元素绑定器--]
The &bElemental Binder&r uses much more elemental energy, and &6must be placed on a full-sized Container&r.[--&b元素绑定器&r使用更多的元素能量,并且&6必须放置在完全大小的容器上&r.--]
The Binder is used to &6craft multiple items together&r, along with elemental energy.[--绑定器用于&6合成多个物品&r,同时提供元素能量.--]

&6Place the ingredients in order&r, starting at the top and going clockwise. It'll use up elemental energy and then complete the craft once it's used enough.[--&6按顺序选择原料&r,从顶部开始,顺时针进行。它会使用元素能量,然后在足够使用后完成合成.--]
Swift as a coursing river...[--像腐烂的河一样迅捷...--]
&bSwift Alloy&r is a higher-end resource for crafting.[--&b扭曲合金&r是更高端的制作资源.--]
By our powers combined[--通过我们的力量结合--]

The &bPure Infuser&r is used to craft some of the more advanced recipes in the mod. It is used to &6craft all 4 elements together&r with items.[--&bPure Infuser&r用于制作mod中一些更高级的配方。它用于&6合成所有4个元素&r和物品.--]
Place each of the four &bPedestals&r around it, with one block between. Provide each Pedestal its element using Element Pipes.[--在它周围放置4个&b基座&r,中间有一个方块。使用元素管道提供每个基座的元素.--]
Place the item ingredients on the correct Pedestals according to the recipe, and it will be crafted.[--根据配方将物品原料放在正确的基座上,它会得到制作.--]
My Springaline, My Springaline[--My Springaline, my Springaline--]
&bSpringaline&r can be crafted one at a time in the &6Infuser&r.[--&b春光&r一次可以在&6灌注机&r中制作.--]
You can also craft it into a &6Springaline Cluster&r and then mine it with Fortune to multiply it.[--你也可以将其制作成&6春晶簇&r然后用时运开采来繁殖它.--]
Hold it together...[--一起拿着它...--]
The &bSource Stabilizer&r can be placed on a Source to &6prevent it from being broken&r. It also slightly boosts their recovery rate.[--&b魔源稳定器&r可以放置在魔源上,&6防止它被破坏&r.它还可以略微提高它们的恢复速率.--]
The Big Suck[--大口大口--]
The &bImproved Element Extractor&r pulls element at a much faster rate.[--&b改良元素提取器&r以更快的速度提取元素.--]
Now we're cooking with gas![--现在我们正在用气体烹饪!--]
The &bFire Furnace&r utilizes the fire element to &6smelt items&r at an accelerated rate.[--&b火炉&r使用火元素以加速&6熔炼物品&r.--]
Fire Furnace[--火炉--]
The &bGem Crystallizer&r will use a &6Pure Crystal&r to infuse an element into a Diamond, creating an &6Elemental Gem&r.[--&b宝石结晶器&r将使用&6纯净水晶&r将元素灌入钻石中,产生&6元素宝石&r.--]
At least it's not research![--至少不是研究!--]
The &bSpell Desk&r is used to create &6Spells&r, which perform a variety of functions.[--&b法术书桌&r用于制作&6法术&r,具有各种功能.--]
Each &bSpell Scroll&r says what it needs in its tooltip.[--每个&b法术卷轴&r都在其提示文本中说明它需要什么.--]
See the &6Elementopedia&r for details on each spell&r.[--查看&6元素opedia&r了解每个法术的详情&r.--]
Spell Scrolls[--法术卷轴--]
Spell Energy[--法术能量--]
&bElement Holders&r hold elemental energy.[--&b元素支架&r持有元素能量.--]
This can be used to &6power Spells&r, or transport it to other devices.[--可用于&6充能法术&r,或将其传输到其他设备.--]
To store elemental energy, right-click a Source or sneak right-click a Container. To release it, right-click a Container.[--要存储元素能量,请右键单击魔源或潜行右键单击容器。要释放它,请右键单击容器。--]
Element Holders[--元素支架--]
Elemental Displacement[--元素移位--]
Moving Source[--移动魔源--]
&bElemental Displacement Plates&r are used to &6move Element Sources&r.[--&b元素置换板&r用于&6移动元素源&r.--]

Place the Plate one block below a Source of its type, then right-click it. After a bit, the Source will be contained in a &bSource Receptacle&r, which can be used to place the Source.[--将板子放在其类型的魔源下方,然后右键单击它。一段时间后,魔源将包含在&b魔源接收器&r中,可用于放置魔源.--]
Source Displacement Plates[--魔源置换板--]
Source Receptacles[--魔源接收器--]
Pure Protection[--纯粹保护--]
&bPure Rock&r is incredibly resiliant, and is &6Wither-proof&r.[--&bPure Rock&r是令人难忘的再生剂,并且是&6防凋灵&r.--]
Endless book of spells[--无尽法术之书--]
The &bGrimoire&r can hold &6up to 100 Spell Scrolls&r! You cannot cast from it, however.[--&b魔法卷轴&r可以容纳&6最多100个法术卷轴&r!但是你无法使用它施放.--]
Redistributed Elemental Wealth[--重新分配元素富集--]
&bShrines&r use a specific element to &6change the world around them&r in some way.[--&b沙林&r使用特定元素来&6以某种方式改变周围的世界&r.--]
For example, they might &6make Lava&r, &6disable teleports&r, &6spawn mobs&r, etc, depending on the Shrine.[--例如,它们可以&6制作熔岩&r,&6禁用传送&r,&6生成生物&r等等,取决于神殿.--]
Shrines do not need an Element Container, they instead accept element directly via Element Pipes.[--神殿不需要元素容器,它们通过元素管道直接接受元素.--]
Shrines[--神殿--]
Make an Element Pipe[--做个元素管道--]
&bElement Pipes&r move elements between Containers.[--&b元素管道&r在容器之间移动元素.--]
Click on a Pipe connection to toggle it, or to make it pull from the Container it's on.[--点击管道连接以切换它,或让它从它开启的容器中拉出.--]
Element Pipes[--元素管道--]
Battlemage[--战斗法师--]
&bSpell foci&r can &6hold multiple spells&r.[--&b法术法术&r可以&6按住多种法术&r.--]
Add a Spell to a focus by &6combining them in an Anvil&r. Cycle through by scrolling while sneaking.[--通过&6在铁砧中堆叠&r将法术添加到聚焦中。潜行时通过滚轮滚轮旋转.--]
Spell Foci[--法术核心--]
REMEMBER ME[--记住我--]
&bShrine Upgrades&r increase the power of the Shrine they are placed on, in some way.[--&b神水升级&r以某种方式增加它们放置在神殿上的功率.--]
Many only work on a specific Shrine; see the &6Elementopedia&r for a list of each.[--许多只对特定神殿工作;每个神殿列表都查看&6元素opedia&r.--]
Shrine Upgrades[--神殿升级--]
Instrument Upgrades[--乐器升级--]
&bRunes&r are basically &6upgrades&r for instruments.[--&b符文&r基本上是&6升级&r的乐器.--]

Place the &bRune Inscriber&r on an Element Container, insert the ingredients, and then use and &ohold&r a &bRune Inscription Chisel&r to craft the Rune.[--将&b符文刻印器&r放在元素容器上,插入原料,然后使用&o按住&b符文刻印凿&r来制作符文.--]
Runes[--符文--]
